languages.text: "Затем, что важнейшая для Простора станция вот-вот превратится в кладбище. Торговля умрет, вчерашние негоцианты возьмутся за пиратство — а что им останется? Связи между мирами ослабнут — астропатов Чорда отправит в расход сразу же, как до них доберется. А Чорда... думаете, она удовлетворится Футфолом? Нет, она пойдет дальше... Может, и на ваши миры".

traits.locale_text: "Затем, что важнейшая для Простора станция вот-вот превратится в кладбище. Торговля умрет, вчерашние негоцианты возьмутся за пиратство — а что им останется? Связи между мирами ослабнут — астропатов Чорда отправит в расход сразу же, как до них доберется. А Чорда... думаете, она удовлетворится Футфолом? Нет, она пойдет дальше... Может, и на ваши миры".

languages.text: "Because a critically important station in the Expanse is about to become a graveyard. Once commerce dies, merchants will turn to piracy. What else could they do? Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."
languages.original_text: "Затем, что важнейшая для Простора станция вот-вот превратится в кладбище. Торговля умрет, вчерашние негоцианты возьмутся за пиратство — а что им останется? Связи между мирами ослабнут — астропатов Чорда отправит в расход сразу же, как до них доберется. А Чорда... думаете, она удовлетворится Футфолом? Нет, она пойдет дальше... Может, и на ваши миры".

Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... Perhaps to your worlds as well."

No, she'll march on... Perhaps to your worlds as well."

Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."

languages.text: “因为科罗努斯扩区中极其重要的星站即将成为一座坟场。一旦这里的商业分崩离析，那些商人只会转而去当海盗，否则他们还能做什么呢？而且，一旦库尔达发现了那些星语者，她肯定会把他们统统杀光，这样以来，扩区众多世界之间的联系也会被削弱。至于库尔达，你真的觉得，她只要拿下落脚港就够了吗？不，她还会继续进军……说不定还会去您的世界。”
languages.original_text: "Because a critically important station in the Expanse is about to become a graveyard. Once commerce dies, merchants will turn to piracy. What else could they do? Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."

traits.locale_text: “因为科罗努斯扩区中极其重要的星站即将成为一座坟场。一旦这里的商业分崩离析，那些商人只会转而去当海盗，否则他们还能做什么呢？而且，一旦库尔达发现了那些星语者，她肯定会把他们统统杀光，这样以来，扩区众多世界之间的联系也会被削弱。至于库尔达，你真的觉得，她只要拿下落脚港就够了吗？不，她还会继续进军……说不定还会去您的世界。”

languages.text: 「エクスパンスの重要なステーションが、墓場になろうとしてるからだ。商業の死は、商人の海賊化を意味する。他にどんな方法があるっていうんだ？チョーダは感応通信官を即始末するだろうし、世界同士の繋がりは弱まる。それに、フットフォールだけで物足りると思うか？チョーダは止めない。君の世界まで進行するかもしれないね」
languages.original_text: "Because a critically important station in the Expanse is about to become a graveyard. Once commerce dies, merchants will turn to piracy. What else could they do? Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスの重要なステーションが、墓場になろうとしてるからだ。商業の死は、商人の海賊化を意味する。他にどんな方法があるっていうんだ？チョーダは感応通信官を即始末するだろうし、世界同士の繋がりは弱まる。それに、フットフォールだけで物足りると思うか？チョーダは止めない。君の世界まで進行するかもしれないね」

languages.text: «Porque una estación importante en la Extensión está a punto de convertirse en un cementerio. Una vez que el comercio muera, los mercaderes recurrirán a la piratería. ¿Qué otra cosa podrían hacer si no? Las conexiones entre mundos se debilitarán, ya que Chorda acabará con los Astrópatas. Y Chorda, ¿cree que Paso será suficiente para ella? No, seguirá... Tal vez con sus mundos».
languages.original_text: "Because a critically important station in the Expanse is about to become a graveyard. Once commerce dies, merchants will turn to piracy. What else could they do? Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."

traits.locale_text: «Porque una estación importante en la Extensión está a punto de convertirse en un cementerio. Una vez que el comercio muera, los mercaderes recurrirán a la piratería. ¿Qué otra cosa podrían hacer si no? Las conexiones entre mundos se debilitarán, ya que Chorda acabará con los Astrópatas. Y Chorda, ¿cree que Paso será suficiente para ella? No, seguirá... Tal vez con sus mundos».

languages.text: "Weil eine essenziell wichtige Station in der Ausdehnung kurz davor steht, zum Friedhof zu werden. Wenn der Handel erst einmal stirbt, dann werden aus Kaufleuten Piraten. Was sollen sie auch sonst tun? Die Verbindungen zwischen den Welten werden geschwächt sein, da Chorda kurzen Prozess mit allen Astropathen machen wird, sobald sie sie in die Finger bekommt. Und Chorda ... glaubt Ihr etwa, Footfall reicht ihr? Nein, sie wird weitermarschieren ... Vielleicht auch zu Euren Welten."
languages.original_text: "Because a critically important station in the Expanse is about to become a graveyard. Once commerce dies, merchants will turn to piracy. What else could they do? Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."

traits.locale_text: "Weil eine essenziell wichtige Station in der Ausdehnung kurz davor steht, zum Friedhof zu werden. Wenn der Handel erst einmal stirbt, dann werden aus Kaufleuten Piraten. Was sollen sie auch sonst tun? Die Verbindungen zwischen den Welten werden geschwächt sein, da Chorda kurzen Prozess mit allen Astropathen machen wird, sobald sie sie in die Finger bekommt. Und Chorda ... glaubt Ihr etwa, Footfall reicht ihr? Nein, sie wird weitermarschieren ... Vielleicht auch zu Euren Welten."

languages.text: « Parce que cette station, essentielle aux Étendues, est sur le point de se transformer en cimetière. Quand le commerce sera mort, les marchands se tourneront vers la piraterie. Ils n'auront pas le choix. Les liens entre les mondes seront affaiblis, puisque Chorda se débarrassera des astropathes dès qu'elle mettra la main dessus. D'ailleurs, croyez-vous vraiment qu'elle s'arrêtera à Castel ? Non, elle se tournera vers d'autres mondes. Les vôtres, peut-être. »
languages.original_text: "Because a critically important station in the Expanse is about to become a graveyard. Once commerce dies, merchants will turn to piracy. What else could they do? Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que cette station, essentielle aux Étendues, est sur le point de se transformer en cimetière. Quand le commerce sera mort, les marchands se tourneront vers la piraterie. Ils n'auront pas le choix. Les liens entre les mondes seront affaiblis, puisque Chorda se débarrassera des astropathes dès qu'elle mettra la main dessus. D'ailleurs, croyez-vous vraiment qu'elle s'arrêtera à Castel ? Non, elle se tournera vers d'autres mondes. Les vôtres, peut-être. »

languages.text: "Çünkü Enginlik'te hayati öneme sahip bir istasyon mezarlığa dönmek üzere. Tecim biterse tüccarlar korsanlığa başlayacaktır. Başka ne yapacaklar? Chorda da Astropatları eline geçirince bir çırpıda köklerini kazıyacağı için dünyalar arası bağlantılar zayıflayacak. Chorda demişken, sizce Binliman'la yetinecek midir? Benimki de soru, durmayacak tabii... Sizin dünyalarınıza da uğrayacak belki."
languages.original_text: "Because a critically important station in the Expanse is about to become a graveyard. Once commerce dies, merchants will turn to piracy. What else could they do? Connections between worlds will be weakened, since Chorda will make short work of Astropaths as soon as she gets to them. And Chorda — do you think Footfall will be enough for her? No, she'll march on... perhaps to your worlds as well."

Benimki de soru, durmayacak tabii... Sizin dünyalarınıza da uğrayacak belki."
